<?php
class PhenotypeComponent_1102 extends PhenotypeComponent
{
	var $tool_type = 1102;
	var $bez  ="Bild";

	function setDefaultProperties()
	{
		$this->set("img_id",0);
		$this->set("alt","");
		$this->set("bildausrichtung","links");
	}

	function edit()
	{

		$this->form_image("",$this->get("img_id"),-1,1,0,0,$this->get("alt"),$this->get("bildausrichtung"),2);

	}

	function update()
	{
		// Auswertung der Eingabemaske und Setzen der Properties des Tools
		$this->fset("img_id","img_id");
		$this->fset("bildausrichtung","img_align");
		if ($this->get("img_id")!=0)
		{
			$this->fset("alt","img_alt");
		}
		else
		{
			$this->set("alt","");
			$this->set("bildausrichtung","links");
		}
		if ($this->get("bildausrichtung")=="")
		{
			$this->set("bildausrichtung","links");
		}


	}


	function render($style)
	{
		// Notwendig, um die Smartyengine richtig zu initalisieren
		eval ($this->initRendering());
		$image="";
		switch ($this->get("bildausrichtung"))
		{
			case "links":
				$style = "float:left";
				break;

			case "rechts":
				$style = "float:right";
				break;

			case "mittig":
				$style = "";
				break;
		}

		if ($this->get("img_id")!=0)
		{
			$alt = $this->get("alt");
			$myImg = new PhenotypeImage($this->get("img_id"));
			$myImg->style = $style;
			$image = $myImg->render($alt);
			if ($this->get("bildausrichtung")=="mittig")
			{
				$image = "<center>". $image ."</center>";
			}
			$mySmarty->assign("image",$image);
		}

		return $mySmarty->fetch($TPL_1);
	}

}
?>
